name: Match Hit - Puzzle Fighter
description:
► Match Hit – Street fighting with street food!

Punch above your weight in this super-fun and completely original match 3 fighting game where matching is the way to land blows on your opponents – the more of one type of junk food you can connect together, the harder you hit. Scarf down strings of hotdogs, burgers, donuts, and potato chips to put some real power behind your punch and knock the stuffing out of an endless stream of challenges. Follow the way of the sumo wrestler and get serious about your eating to give your opponents a serious beating!

► A game with terrible table manners!

• Who needs a varied diet? Match as many foodstuffs of the same type as you can in a single string to do maximum punching damage to your opponent. Long strings will give you multipliers for your next attack. But remember, you’ll have to beat multiple opponents to get to the end of the level, and some are just as well-fed as you, so you’ll need to ration your treats and strategize to break down match 3 barriers and build the ultimate combo attacks at just the right moment if you want to survive.

• Don’t spend all your pocket money on junk food! Collect coins for completing levels and for particularly artful combo attacks, and use them to level up your hero’s abilities, ensuring they have the strength and stamina to take on strings of ever more powerful opponents and super-tough bosses. Work out the best way to apportion your winnings between three parameters—health, damage, and coins—and find the perfect balance in the game for your street-fighting foodie.

• Junk food’s bad for your skin! Well then, just get another one! In Match Hit there are dozens of awesome outfits to collect as you progress through the game, so get munching and punching to win more levels and keep your heroes in tasty new threads.

• Don’t play with your food! Take out your chronic indigestion on a range of entertaining opponents, from street thugs to cops to transport staff to office workers, all of whom are surprisingly buff and astonishingly aggressive. You’ll need a gargantuan appetite to keep matching and take them all out!

► Everybody was junk food fighting!

Grab a pizza the action in this awesome and entertaining fighting game that’ll really satisfy your match 3 cravings. When the chips are down, get matching foodstuffs fast to send a flurry of blows at your hungry opponents, and just make sure you’ve got something left in the food truck for when you reach the really weighty bosses. Have you got the stomach for some real street fighting action? 

Then download Match Hit now!
